title: Zoe Mains Club
body:
Hello.
With the recent teaser for the new champion Zoe I decided to make a club for the mains as this is a new Mid lane mage and i will for sure be maining her.

If anyone else has same views and likewise wants to main this new champ add me on league.
The club tag is "#Zoe"

replies.body: Add me too ^_^ such an awesome champ

Heyo :D Can i get in on this too?

IGN: Phoenixtheshadow

Im a bit late but as the OCE server (was supposed to) get her early i thought i could join in
Im warning you though. Shes mine.
{{sticker:sg-syndra}} 
See you on the rift, my fellow summoners!
{{sticker:sg-ezreal}}
Add me plz. my name is Draven So Op

Invite Me, IGN: Sonatics77

Played her on PBE and fun AF{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
Not sure if I like the "Zoe" club tag or "#Zoe" one better x)
I prefer #zoe I didn’t pick it cause Zoe was gone, so was actually available but it’s kinda bland, you need that little flair if you know wat I mean
